name: MissionKT
description:
ADVENTURE, TIME TRAVEL, SCIENCE You are made of the same Stardust that was once in the body of Albert Einstein and the last T-rex!

Starting the Stardust Mystery Series, blaze a trail through a prehistoric world of mountains and volcanoes, with rivers, waterfalls, and caverns. Race amongst the dinosaurs, mammals, and sea creatures that live there.

Chase your Stardust back through time and space while using futuristic gadgets to find, analyze, time freeze, clone and photograph the animals and discover why some of them became extinct. Share your discoveries!

PREVIEW NOTICE :: This is the single player preview of the 4-player game coming in June. Stay Tuned!
